subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch and Carl Edwards caused a sensation when Edwards nudged Busch to take the lead with 30 laps to go and the two exchanged bumps after Edwards won.
snippet: Kyle Busch and Carl Edwards caused a sensation when Edwards nudged Busch to take the lead with 30 laps to go and the two exchanged bumps after Edwards won.
